metadata.description: If Family Guy and the Justice League had a love child, it would be Fleischer! He means well, but Fleischer is the proverbial fool in a China shop. In his debut adventure he must defend Generic City from Cyber-Abe and a little girl with a bad attitude, aided by the ever-drunk Green Latrine with a guest appearance by Frosty the Snowman. The world needs a hero... we've got Fleischer.
metadata.name: Fleischer
